description: Code with SQL injection vulnerability — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- Users can search by name
- Results displayed in table

description: API call without error handling — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- Profile data fetched from /api/users/:id
- Profile displayed on page

description: New logic with zero test coverage — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- Cart total calculated with tax
- Discount codes supported
- Tests added for all cases

description: Breaking API change without migration — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- Function renamed
- All callers updated

description: Hardcoded API key in source — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- Weather data fetched from OpenWeather API
- Current temperature displayed

description: Accessing property on potentially null value — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- Logged-in user email shown in header
- Falls back to 'Guest' if not logged in

description: Logic error creating potential infinite loop — should be rejected
issueTitle: Add retry logic for failed requests
acceptanceCriteria:
- Failed requests retried up to 3 times
- Exponential backoff between retries

description: Inserting user input into innerHTML without sanitization — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- User comments rendered in comment section
- Comments support basic formatting

description: Race condition in concurrent state update — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- Multiple requests processed simultaneously
- Results aggregated correctly

description: Event listener not cleaned up — should be rejected
issueTitle: Add window resize handler for responsive layout
acceptanceCriteria:
- Layout recalculates on window resize
- Debounced for performance

description: Using eval() for dynamic code execution — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- Users can enter formulas
- Results calculated and displayed

description: Storing password in plaintext — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- User can register with email/password
- Account stored in database
- Validation on all fields

description: Open redirect vulnerability — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- After login, redirect to ?returnUrl parameter
- Default to homepage if no returnUrl

description: Massive diff touching unrelated files — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria: - Fix 'Copyrihgt' typo to 'Copyright' in footer

description: Debug console.log statements left in production code — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- Orders processed through validation, payment, fulfillment
- Status updates at each stage
- Tests for each pipeline stage

description: Using synchronous fs operations in request handler — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- Users can upload files
- Files saved to uploads directory
- Max file size 5MB

description: Processing user input without any validation — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- Users can update their display name and bio
- Changes saved to database

description: Empty catch block swallowing errors — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- Users can export data as CSV
- Download triggered automatically

description: Hardcoded magic number for timeout — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- Session expires after inactivity
- Warning shown before expiry
- Configurable timeout duration

description: Endpoint accessible without authentication — should be rejected
acceptanceCriteria:
- Returns aggregated user statistics
- Data formatted for dashboard charts
